message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I believe it's a great opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. This is a fair price considering its worth to you is $8000, and I'm willing to make a concession to make this deal happen.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm a bit concerned about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. Considering the product's worth to me is $12000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $9000. This is a fair compromise that still allows me to earn a decent profit.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me is $8000

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7000. Considering the product's worth to me is $12000, I'm willing to make another compromise. I'm counteroffering at $8500. This is a fair price that still allows me to earn a decent profit, and I believe it's a reasonable compromise considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway on the last offer, so I'm counteroffering at $8250. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
